description.author: Jonathan Daugherty <cygnus@foobox.com>
description.synopsis: A declarative terminal user interface library
description.description:
Write terminal applications painlessly with 'brick'! You write an
event handler and a drawing function and the library does the rest.


> module Main where
>
> import Brick
>
> ui :: Widget n
> ui = str "Hello, world!"
>
> main :: IO ()
> main = simpleMain ui


To get started, see:

* <https://github.com/jtdaugherty/brick/blob/master/README.md The README>

* The <https://github.com/jtdaugherty/brick/blob/master/docs/guide.rst Brick user guide>

* The demonstration programs in the 'programs' directory


This package deprecates <http://hackage.haskell.org/package/vty-ui vty-ui>.
